title: Emerald Blossom Diamond Haaram - Enchanting Elegance
materials: meticulously crafted. Showcasing brilliant-cut diamonds with exceptional clarity and fire. Adorned with vibrant
pear-shaped Zambian Emeralds (17.82 carats) of deep green hue. Each stone is carefully selected and set to maximize brilliance.
features: A modern take on the traditional Haaram, this necklace features a floral motif. Each flower is intricately designed with a cluster of diamonds, surrounding a center stone of emerald. The pear-shaped emeralds dangle gracefully, adding movement and allure. The platinum setting ensures durability and a timeless aesthetic. Features delicate milgrain detailing around each setting.
colors: The piece showcases a captivating contrast of sparkling white diamonds and lush green emeralds against the subtle sheen of the platinum setting.
occasions: Perfect for special occasions like weddings (Vivaha)
and grand celebrations. It's a statement piece that complements both traditional Indian attire like sarees and lehengas
as well as modern evening gowns.
description: This Emerald Blossom Diamond Haaram is a stunning blend of classic elegance and contemporary design. The Zambian Emeralds add a touch of regal sophistication, while the diamonds ensure brilliance and sparkle. Its durable platinum setting ensures that this treasured piece will be cherished for generations. A true heirloom piece reflecting timeless beauty.
